title: Have you contacted DWP and asked them to reconsider their decision?
ucTitle: Did you ask DWP to reconsider their Universal Credit decision?
subtitle: You can still appeal if you have contacted DWP about their benefit decision but you don’t have the MRN letter, for example, because you lost it or the DWP have said you do not need one.

haveContactedDWP.yes: Yes, I’ve contacted DWP about the decision or DWP have said I don’t need a Mandatory Reconsideration Notice
haveContactedDWP.no: No, I haven’t contacted DWP about the decision

error.required: You need to say whether you contacted DWP about their decision. Select either yes or no.

haveContactedUCDWP.yes: Yes, I asked them to reconsider their decision or DWP have said I don’t need a Mandatory Reconsideration Notice
haveContactedUCDWP.no: No, I have not asked them to reconsider their decision
